mapper.select: SELECT a.bunyang_seq ,a.bunyang_no ,b.user_name apply_user_name ,b.mobile apply_user_mobile ,(COALESCE(a.couple_type_count,0)*2 + COALESCE(a.single_type_count,0)) * COALESCE((select code_value from TB_COM_CODE where parent_code_seq = 'BUNYANG_TIMES' and code_seq = a.bunyang_times), a.price_per_count) AS total_price ,(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(payment_amount),0) FROM TB_BUNYANG_PAYMENT_HISTORY ph WHERE ph.bunyang_seq = a.bunyang_seq AND ph.payment_type = 'DOWN_PAYMENT') AS down_payment ,(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(payment_amount),0) FROM TB_BUNYANG_PAYMENT_HISTORY ph WHERE ph.bunyang_seq = a.bunyang_seq AND ph.payment_type = 'BALANCE_PAYMENT') AS balance_payment FROM TB_BUNYANG_INFO a INNER JOIN TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER b ON a.bunyang_seq = b.bunyang_seq AND b.ref_type = 'APPLY_USER' WHERE a.bunyang_no = #{bunyang_no} UNION SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT a.bunyang_seq ,a.bunyang_no ,b.user_name apply_user_name ,b.mobile apply_user_mobile ,(COALESCE(a.couple_type_count,0)*2 + COALESCE(a.single_type_count,0)) * COALESCE((select code_value from TB_COM_CODE where parent_code_seq = 'BUNYANG_TIMES' and code_seq = a.bunyang_times), a.price_per_count) AS total_price ,(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(payment_amount),0) FROM TB_BUNYANG_PAYMENT_HISTORY ph WHERE ph.bunyang_seq = a.bunyang_seq AND ph.payment_type = 'DOWN_PAYMENT') AS down_payment ,(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(payment_amount),0) FROM TB_BUNYANG_PAYMENT_HISTORY ph WHERE ph.bunyang_seq = a.bunyang_seq AND ph.payment_type = 'BALANCE_PAYMENT') AS balance_payment FROM TB_BUNYANG_INFO a INNER JOIN TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER b ON a.bunyang_seq = b.bunyang_seq AND b.ref_type = 'APPLY_USER' ) t WHERE t.apply_user_name = #{apply_user_name} ORDER BY bunyang_no, apply_user_name ) t
